Name: Description
Fair to Poor Housing: Adults who rate their neighborhood housing conditions as fair or poor.

Name: Source Notes
Fair to Poor Housing: U.S. Census Bureau, Housing and Vacancy Survey, Microdata files (2002, 2005, 2008, 2011, 2014, 2017); retrieved from https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/nychvs.html.

Name: Notes
Fair to Poor Housing: In the Housing and Vacancy Survey (HVS), respondents are asked to rate the physical condition of the residential structures in their neighborhood, on a scale from "excellent, good, fair, or poor."
